mapper.insert: insert into case_data (id, case_name, case_type, abbreviation, creator, description, created_time, lastmodifiedby, lastmodifiedat, base_year, st_date, ed_date, episode, st_time, run_status, domain_group, domain, domain_num, aqm_type, sp_type, ae_type, run_ar, run_pt, run_megan, run_superregion, run_ar_layer, run_pt_layer, run_src, merge_all, itm_status, arinv_inventory, ptinv_inventory, temporal_ref, spatial_ref, chemical_ref, megan_eflai, megan_pftf, scenario_file, metpath, grid_cro_2d, grid_cro_3d, met_cro_2d, met_cro_3d, met_dot_3d, laynum) values (#{id},#{case_name},#{case_type},#{abbreviation},#{creator},#{description},#{created_time},#{lastmodifiedby}, #{lastmodifiedat},#{base_year},#{st_date},#{ed_date},#{episode},#{st_time},#{run_status},#{domain_group},#{domain}, #{domain_num},#{aqm_type},#{sp_type},#{ae_type},#{run_ar},#{run_pt},#{run_megan},#{run_superregion},#{run_ar_layer}, #{run_pt_layer},#{run_src},#{merge_all},#{itm_status},#{arinv_inventory},#{ptinv_inventory},#{temporal_ref},#{spatial_ref}, #{chemical_ref},#{megan_eflai},#{megan_pftf},#{scenario_file},#{metpath},#{grid_cro_2d},#{grid_cro_3d},#{met_cro_2d}, #{met_cro_3d},#{met_dot_3d},#{laynum})
